thread.section_title: FoxPaw Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FoxPaw | foxpaw.com
thread.title: CG

author: CG
title: CG
text: I had been putting off having my son's iPad screen repaired for quite some time, but I am so glad I decided to use FoxPaw to have it taken care of. It was easy to find a drop off location and the kiosk was simple to use. I immediately received a conformation email that the kiosk had received my iPad. The email estimated the cost and the completion time. Later in the day I received a very professional phone call, from a person not an automated machine, telling me the iPad would be ready for pickup by 6:00 PM. I picked the iPad up without any issue and to my pleasant surprise, FoxPaw refunded me $10.00 for the repair (I think I had selected the wrong model of iPad when I dropped it off and my model was less expensive to repair than the model I had selected). It was a fast (less than 10 hours), professional, seamless transaction. Thank you FoxPaw. I highly recommend your service to everyone!!
